subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Del Mar will reduce its schedule to five days a week, dropping most Monday programs. Track officials said there would be racing Wednesdays through Sundays from July 22 to Sept. 9. It is the first time since 1945 the track will not race six days a week.
